reviews.review: dont trust supercomputer dangerous malevolent ai

The story is one of my childhood faves, along-side with the game play, I enjoy the puzzles and of course good ol' trusty portal gun. 
Now, I've always been a big fan of the portal games, but now it's hard finding people to actually PLAY the co-op with, and by that I don't mean match making... I mean people who are using cheats to zoom past levels.
Fantastic puzzle game with good humor and a fun story line. Game has aged well. Challenging but not too hard. Highly recommended! Pick it up during a sale for a super good price.

In 2021 still safe to say its one of the best co-op games of all time.

21/10

Hello everybody, you are looking at this review to see if this game is worth your time, and... it is. Single player has an easy to follow story, many levels to go through, and it keeps the feel of "portal" but adding more. And Co-op was a great, it also has a story, fun with friends, and other people play it so you should to. Cave Johnson, we're done here.
its worth it 10/10. great price, graphics ( for the time ), music and game play. your getting great value out of the portal series to this day.
best game ever made 1000000000000/10 get it just get it you DO IT NOW

Mode solo tr√®s sympa et plus long que Portal 1 (un peu plus de 20 h de jeu solo). Le jeu dispose √©galement d'un mode coop qui permet de jouer √† deux (environ 5 h pour finir le parcours en coop).
J'ai bien aim√© les casse-t√™tes propos√©s, le syst√®me des portails et l'humour noir des robots. Le jeux est r√©alisable par des joueurs de tout niveau. Je recommande.

10 years after this was released, first time playing. Game good, had to use walkthrough once and I'm a dum-dum, so it's safe to say the levels are designed well enough to not make you tear your hair off at every puzzle. Story-wise, it's pretty solid and the humour holds up till today (kinda). Overall, play it, it good.
Good game has a really good story and I get to play co op with my friends.
So good! It has some extra mechanics to the first Portal which I liked.
muy buena historia y jugabilidad, me falta probar el modo multijugador
is cheap and improves everything from the first game there's no real reason not to get it
I love the story and the gameplay, would recommend [just play portal 1 first or this game makes no since]
portal ya no es un juego, es una experiencia, si puedes probrarlo deberias hacerlo

This game is really good, even just 3 hours in i can see that.
The coop in this is hands down the best puzzle game coop i have ever seen,seeing as how it's neither gimmicky or anything,it's basically like a natural expansion of the main game,which is exactly what coop modes need to feel like. As i have basically close to no experience with the singleplayer mode,i cannot say more, but some day i will happily make a follow-up on this review,seeing as how i have only reviewed the coop mode.
full of good puzzles and really fun game

Gioco finito in meno di 8 ore. Come dice Wesa, √® un Portal +, che migliora grafica, giocabilit√†, enigmi, ma risulta  troppo lungo in una storia che si basa solo su puzzle game ed enigmi, e che quindi non ha senso nel tenere in piedi una trama. L'umorismo √® carino s√¨, ma niente di epocale, e gi√† dopo poche ore stanca. Forse √® stato un giocone nel 2011, ma giocandoci oggi, aggiunge poco. Gioco ben fatto, positivo, ma non √® pi√π un must-play, tranne per chi studia antologia e storia dei videogames. Soprattutto Portal, avranno apportato nella loro uscita, una forte innovazione, che si concentra tutto nell'arma. Hanno in pratica costruito un gioco su una sola arma, quella che apre i portali appunto. Giocandoci oggi per√≤, questa novit√† dell'arma, si assimila in pochissime ore. Se cercate giochi invece con trama strutturata, o che vi danno emozioni, cercate oltre.
